summary: ABS MODULE ON MY 1998 VOLVO S70 (76K MILES) IS DEFECTIVE BUT IS NOT COVERED UNDER WARRANTY.  I BELIEVE IT SHOULD BE COVERED FOR THE LIFE OF THE VEHICLE.  I KNOW MANY VOLVO OWNERS HAVE EXPERIENCED THIS SAME PROBLEM.  PLEASE INSTRUCT VOLVO TO ISSUE A RECALL TO FIX THIS CRUCIAL SAFETY PROBLEM.  *JB
